00007  ********+*********+*********+*********+*********+*********+*********+*/

00011 #include <stdlib.h>
00012 #include <string.h>
00013 #include <math.h>
00014 #include <errno.h>
00015 #include "init.h"
00016 #include "io.h"

00019 int alloc_trac()
00020 {
00021 
00022   int ix, iz, iv;
00023   extern double ****tr;
00024 
00025   /* allocation of tr (four levels, all with checks) */
00026   tr = (double****) malloc(NTR * sizeof(double ***));
00027   if (tr == NULL) {
00028       fprintf(stderr, "out of memory in level 1 allocation!\n");
00029       return(1);
00030   }
00031   
00032   for (iv = 0; iv < NTR; iv++) {
00033       tr[iv] = (double ***) malloc(NZ * sizeof(double **));
00034       if (tr[iv] == NULL) {
00035           fprintf(stderr, "out of memory in level 2 allocation!\n");
00036           return(1);
00037       }
00038       
00039       for (iz = 0; iz < NZ; iz++) {
00040           tr[iv][iz] = (double **) malloc(NXMEM * sizeof(double *));
00041           if (tr[iv][iz] == NULL) {
00042               fprintf(stderr, "out of memory in level 3 allocation!\n");
00043               return(1);
00044           }
00045           
00046           for (ix = 0; ix < NXMEM; ix++) {
00047               tr[iv][iz][ix] = (double *) malloc(NYMEM * sizeof(double));
00048               if (tr[iv][iz][ix] == NULL) {
00049                   fprintf(stderr, "out of memory in level 4 allocation!\n");
00050                   return(1);
00051               }
00052           }
00053       }
00054   } /* end of allocation block */
00055 
00056   return 0;
00057 }
